Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Outstanding, uitstekand. We never experienced vegan high dining before and did not know what to expect. Morris & Bella exceeded all expectations - fantastic service, delicious creative food, leave feeling healthy and full, not weighed down by meat. Very nice atmosphere in the restaurant too.

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text:
Absolutely loved our dinner. Innovative dishes beautifully presented, tasteful with varied flavours.
The space is very cosy as well with good atmosphere. ‚Ä¶

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Good but not great, felt like other fancy dining but vegan and without a lot of texture and strong flavours. A bit too brightly lit, not a great atmosphere.

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: My babe liked it. Food was creative and tasty, presented in a nice way, but a 4 course meal took 3.5 hours to be served - way too long. The waitress was friendly and explained everything in detail. The place is nice and cosy. Price-wise, was above average you'd pay in Amsterdam.

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Wow! Fabulous food. Wonderful mix of tastes. Menu changes every two weeks. Veg & Vegan friendly but with fish and meat as well. Presentation a 10+. Staff is super friendly. Great wine selection and affordable! I will be back often.

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Fantastic place! Morris & Bella is different from most other vegan restaurants. There's a 4-5-6 course menu/wine arrangement which is well thought out and changes every month. The different flavors are incredible and unique! The warmth and ‚Ä¶

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Family run restaurant with a very honest seasonal menu. We had a lovely evening here, I just wish it had better atmosphere and you didn‚Äôt have to wait so long for food.

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Amazing food that revolves around vegetables. The dishes taste superb, and the owners are very kind. Great atmosphere and very affordable as well!

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Great vegan food, delicious wine. As a frequent carnivor, I would say that anybody would come here and enjoy their time, the service is good, so is the wine and specially the food. Amazing

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Best vegan cuisine in Amsterdam. We had a plated 5 course meal with wine and everything was outstanding. Not just dinner but an event! A wonderful way to spend the evening enjoying fine crafted, well thought out, beautiful and did I mention ‚Ä¶

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Nice vegan food, gezellig and friendly staff!!

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Splendidly vegan cuisine, also a treat to the non-vegans as one can order fish/meat supplements.. Beautifully curated wine list too üíô.. Lovely couple run haven

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Enjoyed a very pleasant dinner at Morris & Bella. It's a small place with only one person providing table service. The menu is vegetarian focused, but with additional fish and meat additions for those who crave that (like me...). The choice ‚Ä¶

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Fine dining in casual atmosphere. Food is superb. Vegan if you want, but add fish and meat if you prefer. But either way it is delicious (and beautiful). Changing menu to allow for the local freshest produce. Delightful wine list, charming and attentive service.  This is a must visit restaurant!!

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: It was an absolutely wonderful experience!Vegan food done right. We will be back as soon as the menu changes ü§©

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text:
Amazingly delicious food. Super warm service.

I'm not a vegan but every course was a delight

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: This nice little place serves some of the best food in town, and the best part is that it can be vegetarian or vegan. In fact, the menu is based around the veggies for a change. ‚Ä¶

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Sometimes you wish you had a 6th star to give to those places that are just so exceptionally good and unique; that rise above all your expectations. Morris & Bella is one of those places. ‚Ä¶

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Nicely located in a relatively quiet are of Amsterdam, near the Art Deco (Amsterdamse School) rich architectural district. A modest but well-picked selection of 'biologic' beers and wines. Mostly vegan food options. Helpful staff.

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Lovely restaurant with very friendly owners. The atmosphere was cozy - the food delicious. The vegan cheese plate was something special!

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Everything here is just perfect: the food (all vegan, with meat & fish options), the drinks, the setting (small and cozy) and finally the service. The latter almost makes you forget you're in Amsterdam, and just goes to show that some restaurants still do care about their guests.

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Wonderfully creative food, great wines and a lovely atmosphere. One of the very best places to eat inventive vegan/vegetarian food in Europe!

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: We are not vegitarians ..but we r foodies..here u can get meat added to certain dishes... Morris demonstrated his ability to really sense the tastes and made incredible dishes...the dessert is a must have....u will be amazed and love the tastes.....yes...it is astounding....u gotta visit!

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Atmosphere was personal and intimate. Service was wonderful anf Bella explained every dish, which was wonderful! Tnr chocolate dessert was absolutely one of a kind!

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Unexpectedly good food for a good price. Bella is serving you food and Morris is dancing in the kitchen. The food is good and they have a nice selection of wines.

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Great food, vegetarian but with small meat supplements if you want. Taste is delicious. Great staff.

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Great place with excellent vegan food. Through optional additions they also cater for those who are not strictly vegan. The owners run it themselves.

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Really nice, well prices, vegetable based dishes (meat or fish can be added as an extra). Also great wine selection‚Äã!!

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Vegan in its best way! Extremely tasty, also for the eyes! Would definitely recommend to everyone!

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Great menu with many options for gluten-free dining.

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Exceptionally good food, very cozy atmosphere and nice selection of wines

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Fantastic food. Attentive service. We need more like this in Amsterdam, please!

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Lovely place. Amazing food and super friendly staff.

Name: Morris & Bella
Review Text: Amazing food, great service and nice ambiance

Name: Morris & Bella
